name: pet-hotel-reservations
description: A database-driven website to make reservations at a luxury hotel for pets.

scripts.preinstall: pip3 install --user virtualenv && venv/bin/pip3 install -r requirements.txt && npm run client-install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: George Pence and Nathan Taylor
